bill.title: Mississippi Health Care Industry Zone Act; revise requirements for certification of health care industry zones under.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 57-117-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Authorize The Mississippi Development Authority To Certify Health Care Industry Zones In Areas In Which A Health Care Industry Facility Is Located Within A Five-mile Radius Of A University Or College That Is Accredited By The Southern Association Of Colleges And Schools And Awards Degrees Or Trains Workers For Jobs In Health Care Or Pharmaceutical Fields Of Study Or Work; To Bring Forward Section 57-117-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Defines Certain Terms Under The Mississippi Health Care Industry Zone Act, For The Purposes Of Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
